charaepi_ch0003_90_calme/2301_1101_0100_:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] heard sounds of a
camera shutter in town.
charaepi_ch0003_90_calme/2301_1201_0400_:
I’ve been pressing the shutter so many times, but
nothing’s showing up on camera!
charaepi_ch0003_90_calme/2301_0302_0700_:
You’re taking pictures even though
nothing’s there?
charaepi_ch0003_90_calme/2301_0402_0800_:
Oh, there’s something. She just can’t get it
on camera.
charaepi_ch0003_90_calme/2301_1201_0900_: Viola is helping me and Greninja with our training.
charaepi_ch0003_90_calme/2301_1201_1000_:
The training is for Greninja to move so incredibly
fast that Viola can’t get a picture of him with her
camera.
charaepi_ch0003_90_calme/2301_1201_1100_:
For a photographer like me, it’s quite frustrating,
but Greninja’s speed is the real deal!
charaepi_ch0003_90_calme/2301_1201_1200_:
Well done, Greninja. Seems like your training
went well.
charaepi_ch0003_90_calme/2301_1201_1300_:
You’ve gotten a lot tougher than when I met
you in Kalos, Calem!
charaepi_ch0003_90_calme/2301_1201_1500_: You escaped my camera! Be proud of that!
charaepi_ch0003_90_calme/2301_1201_1600_:
I guess if you feel it has been, we can say this
training’s been fruitful.
charaepi_ch0003_90_calme/2301_1201_1700_: When I met Viola, I had just left Vaniville Town...
charaepi_ch0003_90_calme/2301_1201_1800_:
I used to think it was important how different I
was from other people.
charaepi_ch0003_90_calme/2301_1201_1900_:
But that wasn’t working well for me... So I went
on a journey to have a good look at myself.
charaepi_ch0003_90_calme/2301_1201_2000_:
Right after I left, I met a Froakie that had different
colors than others.
charaepi_ch0003_90_calme/2301_1201_2100_: It’s like you were destined to meet!
charaepi_ch0003_90_calme/2301_1201_2200_:
That’s what I thought as well. I thought it
was destiny.
charaepi_ch0003_90_calme/2301_1201_2300_: It was a new encounter from a new journey.
charaepi_ch0003_90_calme/2301_1201_2400_:
There were things that reminded me of my past
journeys, but there were also things that were
a first to me.
charaepi_ch0003_90_calme/2301_1201_2500_:
Everything I’ve experienced has been a stepping
stone for me.
charaepi_ch0003_90_calme/2301_1201_2600_:
Of course I’m gonna carry on with my journey.
I’m still in the middle of one right now!
charaepi_ch0003_90_calme/2301_1201_2700_: And this time, I’m gonna achieve my goal...
charaepi_ch0003_90_calme/2301_1201_2900_:
You two look so great right now! Fantastic!
Just fantastic!
charaepi_ch0003_90_calme/2301_1201_3400_: There’s someone I really want to beat.
charaepi_ch0003_90_calme/2301_1201_3500_:
That person is my precious friend—someone
I respect...
charaepi_ch0003_90_calme/2301_1201_3600_: and a really cool and strong Trainer.
charaepi_ch0003_90_calme/2301_1201_3800_: I need your help with something!
charaepi_ch0003_90_calme/2301_1201_4000_: I don’t know what she thinks of me.
charaepi_ch0003_90_calme/2301_1201_4100_:
But she’s the closest to me—and the opponent I
want to beat the most...
charaepi_ch0003_90_calme/2301_1201_4200_: She’s my neighbor—and also my rival!
